text: BWO was a synthpop group from Sweden. It was established in 2003, and broke up in 2010. Up to 2009, the group was known under the full name Bodies Without Organs. BWO participated at Melodifestivalen in 2005, 2006, 2008 and 2009. ==Discography== ===Albums=== * 2005 Prototype * 2006 Halcyon Days * 2006 Halcyon Nights - The Remixes (Dec '06) * 2007 Fabricator * 2008 Pandemonium (Greatest Hits) * 2009 Big Science ==Other websites== * Official site Category:2003 establishments in Sweden Category:2010 disestablishments in Europe Category:Swedish pop music groups Category:Synth-pop Category:2000s Swedish music groups Category:2010s Swedish music groups Category:21st-century disestablishments in Sweden
title: BWO
